messages.body:
Dear Friend, 
Top of the day to you.  
Let me crave your indulgence to introduce myself to you, I am Dr.Solomon Koffi staff of one of the leading Banks here in Cotonou Benin Republic. I will want to solicit for your assistance to help receive an inheritance sum due for claim to one of our late customers, Mr. Thomas Eugene Green, He died in automobile accident with members of his family. 
I happen to be the Resident internal controller in the branch where he deposited the total sum of $9.7Million USD on the 6th of June 2005, It was discovered from his personal attorney that he did not state in his WILL any next of kin to claim this funds, we have sent routine notification to his forwarding address and discovered that he does not have anyone to claim this funds.  
It is very unwise to allow this man's fruit of labour to go into the wrong hands because no one has come forward to claim the funds. Thus my proposal to you is to stand as his next of kin to claim the funds, His personal attorney has worked things out and I am willing to furnish you with neccessary information the bank here will demand from you during the process of this transaction. 
Please if you are willing to assist, I will want you to furnish me with your particulars, so as to enable me give you further details. Please, you have to be an honest and trusted person. Please contact me on my alternative email on dr_solomonkoffi@yahoo.fr for more information with the below informations filled out. 
NAME: ............................. 
MAILING ADDRESS:................... 
AGE: .............................. 
STATUS:............................ 
STATE/COUNTRY:..................... 
TEL/FAX NUMBERS:................... 
CELL PHONE:........................ 
COMPANY NAME: ..................... 
OCCUPATION: ....................... 
I look forward to working with you. 
Regards, 
Dr.Solomon Koffi

Note for the new reader: this is a Dead Bank Customer 'format'. The basic M.O.:
1) help us claim (i.e., embezzle) an (imaginary) inheritance
2) there will be paperwork
3) the paperwork will require the services of a lawyer
4) the lawyer will require payment (that is the scam)

messages.body:
Dear Good Brother Camille White , 
Good evening to you and your family in the name of God Almighty.
Please do accept my sincere gratitute for your positive response to my message.
Before sending the application form to you,I will like to remind that the business that I have just proposed needs urgent attendance too.Above all, I will want you understand with me that the business that I have proposed to you should be accepted based on your personal and voluntary acceptance.As my proposal has said it all concerning the nature and the part you are to play so that we can have success in this business. 
I want to remind you immediately because of how important and urgent this transaction is to me so that bank cannot lay their hands on the fund that my late client has suffered for all this years before his sudden death. Be informed that all I need from you is trust, confidence and your capability to handle this transaction as I will not want any disappointment from your side and more so I equally want you to assure me that you will not disappoint me or betray me if this money is transferred into your bank account. Presently, this money is still there in the bank unclaimed that is why I have contacted you to assist me claim this money to enable me come over to you for sharing which is for our benefit and for that of our families as well.Please I stand to assure you that this transaction is risk free as I did mention in my first message and will be 100% successful for all I need from you is to follow my instructions as to avoid making any mistake. Therefore, on your reply, I will send to you a text of application letter you will re-type and send to the bank for approval.
Finally, I will be waiting for your urgent reply to this mail, so that we will proceed further and I assure you that within two weeks time from the date of submission of the application letter to the bank, this money must surely be released and transferred into your bank account because the bank have been expecting the relation or next of kin to the deceased to have come to claim this money for a very long time now. 
But all the same I will not hesitate to send the application form to you on hearing from you.  
My Best regards,  
Dr Solomon Koff.
messages.raw:
Dr Solomon Koffi (or Koff)

He's a religious Lad, but I'll let that one slide for now, as he's done something much worse from Cammy's point of view... Any guesses?

messages.body:
Dear Good Sister Camille White,
Good evening to you and your family in the name of God almighty. I have seen your mail and all the points discuss on it was quite understood.
You see my Sister, we just finish from the board of director's meeting this morning concerning this funds, so I am very happy the way things is moving now. Again Sister, now that we are in this stage you have to be very serious because you know the bank managements only gave us 72 hours to get the answers ready.
Regards, the questions I seen the questions but I don't know exactly the whole answers, but I have to meet the people in charge of computer, which I have done that already which they promised giving me the correct answers with some conditions that I will give them 1.450$ which I also promised giving them as soon as they give me the answer ready.
Meanwhile, as soon as they give me the answers I will send it to you immediately so that you will return it to the bank. So my good Sister, what you have to be doing now is to be prayerfull for almighty to touch the managements of our bank so that they will approve the funds for us. 
Please Sister , as soon as you receive this message try and call me with my private number +229 95 81 42 10. So that we can discuss more on the issue any time any day you want to reach me.Do try to send your private number for me so that I can reach you anytime I want.
While I rest my words here till I hear from you again. 
Yours Lovely Brother,
Dr Solomon Koff.

messages.body:
Dr Koffi,
I can't call you because I haven't been able to use a phone since I was seven - childhood injury left me with ruptured eardrums. 
I'm not totally deaf, but telephones are useless to me, and the same with radios. 
I also find the movies a bit of a bore unless they're captioned. It's the only way that my Wyrd is unfavourable.
I'll raise my Spirit to Odin All-Father for His Wisdom to help us through. Whether or not He helps your bank people isn't something I can promise though.
BTW - you can call me Cammy - all my friends do.
Cammy White

Cammy

Cammy

messages.body:
Sir/Madam, 
After coming back from the High Court of Justice etc, this morning for the procurement of the legal documents on your behalf, i decided to inform you as i promised. 
I will get the three documents and do all other logistics by this week if only you can abide on my directives. The three documets you are asked to submitte by the bank officials is as follows : 1) Certificate of Death. $1.250 Usd 2) Certificate of Legality. $ 1.200 Usd 3) Afidavite of Claim. $ 1.000 Usd TOTAL FEES $ 3.450 Usd  Please contact the bank as soon as possible for an extention of extra working days and send to me immediately my consultation fee of $ 1.100 Usd and documentations fee to enable me finance the procurement of the vital required documents by the bank. Those documents will effect the fast processing of the transfer of the funds. I will go and stand as your lawyer in all official meeting as it concerns the transaction and have good two or more dinner meetings outside from official meetings with the bank DIRECTOR Mr Hidris Walter, and you know these arrangements will cost me some money . You will pay me only $6.000 Usd as my service charges and that will come only when i have finished and you have your transaction completed and transfered into your bank account.  You will be expected to sign some documents with the justice ministry here and have the other documents mentioned registered and legalised in the BENIN justice ministry which i will stand for you in signing and sending the copies and the recepit, of the documents to you as i secure them . 
I want to assure you that there is no problem because i believe on my friend MR HIDRIS WALTER, that there will no delay in the transfer only we will make this legalisation and obtain the said documents as required and claim this funds. I have known from the bank and this is the processes of the transfer . Please use the below information to send the consultation fee money of $ 1.100 Usd to me together with documentations fee which is $ 4.550 Usd, through western union money transfer or money gram as soon as possible to enable me start up the work immedaitely.Bellow is the informations you use in sending the money.

Mr Yamani,
You can stop that Sir/Madam crap - Holy Odin, even my father wasn't such a complete shit that he'd call a boy "Camille"! You can also tell me what those documents are. A death certificate I know - but what are "Certificate of Legality" and "Afidavite of Claim"? I like to know what I'm paying for. What were you trying to send me and why wouldn't it get through? Was it an executable file or something like that?  My filters would have stripped it automatically.
Camille White

messages.body:
Dr Koff,
For the love of Freyja... you just don't get it!  This lawyer that you said was so well connected is so short of money that he's begging me to send the price of a quality cappuccino! For fuck's sake, it costs me more to send the money than the amount itself! What's more, it means that you - top staff on a leading bank in your country - are likewise so poor that you can't afford a few bucks. What the fuck do you get paid there?  How do you afford to drive a car, or pay for lunch, or buy a new suit? It's pretty obvious that you and the lawyer can't be who you say you are or you wouldn't be so short of ready cash. Tell me exactly who you are and what's going on - like where the money came from. 
I want the truth!
Camille White

get booked
